item.title: Plugging Open Policy Agent into Envoy
item.description: Photo by Kutan Ural on Unsplash Getting Started with Envoy & Open Policy Agent — 03 — Plugging OPA into Envoy This is the 3rd Envory & Open Policy Agent Getting Started Guide. Each guide is intended to explore a single feature and walk through a simple implementation. Each guide builds on the concepts explored in the previous guide with the end goal of building a very powerful authorization service by the end of the series.
